citations.narrative:
According to a facility disposition (de-acquisition) record dated August 8, 2024, a chicken named Amelia was killed by an
animal. The animal created an access hole in the netting of the primary enclosure (coop). The failure of the primary
enclosure to restrict other animals from entering the enclosure resulted in the death of this chicken.
Primary enclosures must be designed, constructed of suitable materials, and maintained to restrict other animals from
entering the enclosure.
To be corrected from this day (12/9/2024) forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(iv)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
According to a facility disposition (de-acquisition) record dated August 8, 2024, a chicken named Amelia was killed by an 
animal. The animal created an access hole in the netting of the primary enclosure (coop). The failure of the primary 
enclosure to restrict other animals from entering the enclosure resulted in the death of this chicken. 
 
Primary enclosures must be designed, constructed of suitable materials, and maintained to restrict other animals from 
entering the enclosure. 
 
To be corrected from this day (12/9/2024) forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
